title: Beef rendang with mango chutney and sticky rice
description: Rendang curries are thicker and richer than most curries from South-East Asia, but they still have all the delicious fresh flavours.
ingredients: 3 cardamom pods, crushed and seeds removed
1 thumb-sized piece fresh root ginger, peeled and chopped
750g/1lb 10oz beef shin, boneless and cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
250ml/9fl oz strong veal or beef stock, heated
